name: Cervical Spine MRI Report
description: Generate a schema for cervical spine MRI with level-wise findings, prior fusion/hardware context, and structured impression points.

name: Oncology Follow-up Lesion List
description: Generate a schema for oncology follow-up report with lesion-level structured findings and categorical assessment.
text:
Follow-up CT Abdomen/Pelvis with contrast.
Findings:
1) Liver segment IV lesion, 12 mm, likely benign.
2) Right adrenal lesion, 18 mm, indeterminate.
3) Left iliac node, 9 mm short-axis, suspicious.
4) Pulmonary nodule in right lower lobe, 6 mm, stable.
Impression:
- Mixed lesion burden with one suspicious nodal focus.
- Recommend interval follow-up in 3 months.

name: Pathology Biomarker Panel
description: Generate a schema for pathology molecular report with biomarker-level values, categorical positivity, and optional quantitative percentages.
text:
Specimen: Lung adenocarcinoma biopsy.
Biomarker panel:
- EGFR: Negative
- ALK: Negative
- ROS1: Negative
- PD-L1 TPS: 35%
- KRAS G12C: Positive
Interpretation:
Actionable mutation detected (KRAS G12C). PD-L1 expression is intermediate.

name: Discharge Medication Plan
description: Generate a schema for discharge medication list with itemized drug entries and dosing frequency fields.
text:
Discharge medications:
1. Aspirin 81 mg PO daily
2. Atorvastatin 40 mg PO nightly
3. Metoprolol succinate 50 mg PO twice daily
4. Apixaban 5 mg PO twice daily
Plan:
Continue all medications unless bleeding develops.

name: Simple Vitals Note
description: Generate a compact schema for one-paragraph vitals note.
text: Patient ID 12345. BP 128/82. HR 76. Temp 36.9 C. No acute distress.
